dct_title_s: Town plan of Lagos, capital city of the Federation of Nigeria. Up to date on 1st of Oct. 1960
dct_description_sm: "Supplement to a new Topographical Map of Nigeria, compiled and published by the Shell - BP Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria Limited to commemorate Nigeria's Independence." Cover title: Nigeria. Independence year 1960. Verso: "Town plan of Lagos; capital city of the Federation of Nigeria.". Public buildings depicted in red.
dct_creator_sm: Shell-BP Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria
dct_publisher_sm: Lagos : Shell-BP Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria Limited, 1960.
